mapper.insert: insert into db_ebayapi (SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, APITIME, DAYDIFF, LASTAPITIME, ORDERNUM, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, LASTTIME, APIFLAG, DAYTYPE, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apitime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daydiff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastapitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lasttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apiflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{daytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_ebayapi set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHOPTYPENAME = #{shoptypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APITIME = #{apitime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAYDIFF = #{daydiff,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LASTAPITIME = #{lastapitime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LASTTIME = #{lasttime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APIFLAG = #{apiflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAYTYPE = #{daytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, APITIME, DAYDIFF, LASTAPITIME, ORDERNUM, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, LASTTIME, APIFLAG, DAYTYPE, DESCR from db_ebayapi where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, CORPID, OPENFLAG, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPENAME, APITIME, DAYDIFF, LASTAPITIME, ORDERNUM, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, LASTTIME, APIFLAG, DAYTYPE, DESCR from db_ebayapi
